frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-optimus-manager-indicator
frozen.shortDescription: Intel/Hybrid/NVIDIA GPU Switch Note: The GPU mode activated doesn't show up in the options, by example: When you turn on the PC you are gonna be in Intel mode so Intel option is not gonna be shown. Note: Optimus Manager Indicator is made(for the moment) for Arch based distributions with optimus-manager.
frozen.longDescription: Intel/Hybrid/NVIDIA GPU Switch Note: The GPU mode activated doesn't show up in the options, by example: When you turn on the PC you are gonna be in Intel mode so Intel option is not gonna be shown. Note: Optimus Manager Indicator is made(for the moment) for Arch based distributions with optimus-manager.
